Release notes

0.3.4

  • Allow selection of individual modules in univariate and multivariate blocks.
  • Import and export of resources from and to YAML is now possible.
  • The Python SDK has been extended:
    • Allow creating resources from code, YAML, TOML or JSON.
    • Allow listing all sources exposed by a flow.
    • Uploading data does no longer require a source of type upload. When uploading, a data set will be created. Data sets can be used in flows and series sets.
